name: LOOMING (Neilosg)
description:
You're a freelance engineer, sent to do a job that goes awfully wrong. Now you're stuck in a containment facility owned by a uncaring bureaucratic organisation with  its captured creatures roaming freely. 

This project is my first ever game, it has a lot of issues, lots of bugs, but it's finished for now. If you play it i hope you enjoy it!

Neil O'Sullivan Greene  - Programming, 2d/3d Art, UX design, UI design, 

Matthew Corrigan -Sound design/Music

Bartek Gruba - UI/Graphic design
